thread.section_title: Fireside Chimney Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fireside Chimney Supply | www.firesidechimneysupply.com
thread.title: Tim B
thread.title_full: Fireside Chimney Supply reviewed by Tim B

author: Tim B
title: Tim B
text:
Liner and components were of good quality. Chimney cap went on without issue and looks great. The liner itself was easily cut with a cut-off wheel mounted on a 4 1/2" grinder, aviation shears could be used also. The screws that hold the chimney cap on are threaded through plates that are welded onto the sheet metal, that is the way it should be done!
Delivery was extremely fast, had it next day to NJ.
